src:
Mobil Tabrak Pembatas Bundaran di Pondok Indah Jaksel
04 Nov 2019, 05:32 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Kecelakaan mobil terjadi di kawasan Pondok Indah, Jakarta Selatan. Mobil tersebut menabrak pembatas bundaran.
"Informasinya betul, kecelakaan kendaraan roda empat menabrak pembatas Bundaran Pondok Indah Jl Metro Pondok Indah Jaksel," kata petugas NTMC Polri, Hari saat dikonfirmasi, Senin (4/11/2019).
Kecelakaan yang terjadi di Jalan Metro Pondok Indah itu terjadi pukul 03.39 WIB. Hari mengatakan petugas kepolisian sudah berada di lokasi melakukan penanganan kecelakaan tersebut.
"Petugas sudah di lokasi, menggali informasi soal kecelakaan tersebut," sebutnya.
Hari mengaku belum mendapatkan informasi detail mengenai penyebab kecelakaan tersebut. Ia juga mengaku belum mengetahui ada tidaknya korban dalam kecelakaan itu.
Sebelumnya, kecelakaan pemotor terjadi di Jl Metro Pondok Indah, Jaksel sekitar pukul 01.41 WIB. Namun, Hari mengaku belum mengetahui apakah kedua kecelakaan itu berkaitan atau tidak.
"Kami belum mengetahui apakah kecelakaan ini berkaitan dengan yang tadi. Kami belum mendapatkan laporannya," tutur Hari.

(ibh/mae)
text:
Hit the Roundabout Car at the Pondok Indah South Jakarta Roundabout
04 Nov 2019, 05:32 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - A car accident occurred in Pondok Indah, South Jakarta. The car crashed into a roundabout.
"The information is correct, a four-wheeled vehicle accident crashed into the Pondok Indah Roundabout Jl Metro Pondok Indah South Jakarta," said the NTMC Polri officer, Hari when confirmed, Monday (11/04/2019).
The accident that occurred on Jalan Metro Pondok Indah occurred at 3:39 WIB. Hari said police officers were at the location to handle the accident.
"Officers are already on location, digging up information about the accident," he said.
Hari claimed not to get detailed information about the cause of the accident. He also claimed not to know whether there were any victims in the accident.
Previously, a motorcycle accident occurred on Jl Metro Pondok Indah, South Jakarta at around 01.41 WIB. However, Hari claimed not to know whether the two accidents were related or not.
"We do not know whether this accident is related to the previous one. We have not yet received the report," Hari said.

(ibh / mae)
